XII.i.1.B.1.o
.
When DIC Benefits Are Not Payable
DIC benefits are not payable if the
cause of death is found to have been the result of a Veteran’s own willful misconduct, or
Veteran’s death was wrongfully and intentionally caused by the claimant.
Note
:  A surviving spouse may be considered for entitlement to Survivors Pension if entitlement to DIC cannot be established because the Veteran’s death was due to the Veteran’s willful misconduct.
References
:  For more information on
willful misconduct, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.C
, and
development actions to determine if the Veteran’s death is a homicide, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 2.B.2
.
